channel.title: Help with compile plzzzzzz
channel.description:
i just made a post about hosting servers and i need help with my compiler :mad: :( :eek: :eek: :eek:[tt][tt][/tt][/tt]
\ it says...java is unregidnized and i just downloaded java 5 updated 10!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Help with compile plzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @Hikaru Hikaru
item.description:
@Hikaru wrote:

Heres the answer; FOLLOW CORRECTLY:

1.) Go to Start and right-click My Computer.
2.) Click Properties.
3.) Go to the Advanced tab
4.) Click “Environment Variables”
You should see 2 lists.
5.) Click NEW on the “User variables for (your name)”
6.) Type in Path
7.) In value, put in the directory where java.exe and javac.exe is located, for me its: C:\Sun\SDK\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin

Now try to compile. It should work

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compile plzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

[quote=“swiftskater1, post:5, topic:49052”]Compiling.
‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . . now wut im useing test scape[/quote]
Set your classpath.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compile plzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

[quote=“eclipse245, post:2, topic:49052”]ok go to ur compiler and edit it…and erase everything that u see and add this:

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

And if ur using PimpScape then leave ithe same tell me if ur problem is solved[/quote]
Wrong.Put this in your compiler.

@echo off COLOR 09 title SERVERNAME echo Compiling. javac *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compile plzzzzzz
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

ok go to ur compiler and edit it…and erase everything that u see and add this:

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

And if ur using PimpScape then leave ithe same tell me if ur problem is solved

Read full topic
